extendedInfo.description: Weather forecast for any area is very crucial news. Sometimes t does become a necessary to be updated with the change in the climatic conditions. Mostly it becomes a very crucial one in times of any climatic disturbance such as flood situation, cyclonic weathers, high tides, earthquakes assumptions and many more. For this very reason, you need to be always in touch with the advance weather situation in before hand for 10 days.
